head.citation-title: 5th International Conference of Pioneer Computer Scientists, Engineers and Educators, ICPCSEE 2019
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 104 papers. The special focus in this conference is on Pioneer Computer Scientists, Engineers and Educators. The topics include: Method for Recognition Pneumonia Based on Convolutional Neural Network; underwater Image Saliency Detection Based on Improved Histogram Equalization; kernelized Correlation Filter Target Tracking Algorithm Based on Saliency Feature Selection; image Edge Detection Method Based on Ant Colony Algorithm; biological Network Modeling Based on Hill Function and Hybrid Evolutionary Algorithm; design of Five-Axis Camera Stabilizer Based on Quaternion Untracked Kalman Filtering Algorithm; mutual Learning Model for Skin Lesion Classification; business-Oriented Dynamic Reconfiguration Model of Cloud Computing Network; secure, Efficient and Searchable File System on Distributed Clouds; Superimposed Attention Mechanism-Based CNN Network for Reading Comprehension and Question Answering; design of Landslide Warning System; Scheduling Method Based on Backfill Strategy for Multiple DAGs in Cloud Computing; study on Evaluation Method of Teaching Quality Based on Cloud Model and D-S Theory; bottom-Up Teaching Reformation for the Undergraduate Course of Computer Organization and Architecture; education Platform of Congenital Heart Disease Based on Mixed Reality Technology; construction and Practice of Higher Vocational Colleges’ Quality Assurance System Based on Evaluation; research on Teachers’ Development from International Perspective; research on the Teaching Model of Experimental Virtualization in Digital Logic and Digital System Design Course; teaching Reform of Ideological and Political Education in the Course of Electromagnetic Field and Electromagnetic Wave; application of Grey Correlation Analysis in Physical Fitness Assessment of Higher Vocational Students; empirical Study of Hybrid Optimization Strategy for Evolutionary Testing.

translated-sourcetitle.$: Communications in Computer and Information Science
